feedback.overall_assessment: Comprehensive editorial analysis completed. Story shows significant concerns with 7 major issues, 5 minor issues, and 0 informational notes across structural, continuity, and style dimensions. Issues span 5 different categories.

issues.suggestion: Fill timeline gaps and ensure chronological consistency
Ensure plot events have logical cause-effect connections
Maintain consistent world rules and setting details
Maintain consistent rules for supernatural/technological elements
Maintain consistent POV throughout scenes and avoid switching between characters' perspectives inappropriately
Maintain consistent authorial voice and tone throughout the story
Ensure language is appropriate for the target age group
Ensure foreshadowed elements are properly resolved
Ensure location details remain consistent throughout
Be consistent with how much access readers have to characters' thoughts and feelings
Ensure the story's tone remains consistent with the established voice
Vary sentence lengths and structures to improve prose rhythm

suggested_revisions.reason: Plot continuity issue: Timeline gap or inconsistency
suggested_revisions.instruction: Fix plot continuity: Fill timeline gaps and ensure chronological consistency

suggested_revisions.reason: Plot continuity issue: Illogical cause-effect relationship
suggested_revisions.instruction: Fix plot continuity: Ensure plot events have logical cause-effect connections
Fix POV consistency: Maintain consistent POV throughout scenes and avoid switching between characters' perspectives inappropriately

suggested_revisions.reason: Voice consistency issue: Inconsistent narrative voice
suggested_revisions.instruction: Fix voice consistency: Maintain consistent authorial voice and tone throughout the story
Fix plot continuity: Ensure foreshadowed elements are properly resolved
Fix world consistency: Maintain consistent world rules and setting details

suggested_revisions.reason: World-building continuity issue: Location description inconsistency
suggested_revisions.instruction: Fix world consistency: Ensure location details remain consistent throughout

suggested_revisions.reason: World-building continuity issue: Magic/technology system inconsistency
suggested_revisions.instruction: Fix world consistency: Maintain consistent rules for supernatural/technological elements

suggested_revisions.reason: POV consistency issue: POV distance inconsistency
suggested_revisions.instruction: Fix POV consistency: Be consistent with how much access readers have to characters' thoughts and feelings
Fix voice consistency: Ensure the story's tone remains consistent with the established voice
Fix language appropriateness: Ensure language is appropriate for the target age group

suggested_revisions.reason: Prose rhythm issue: Monotonous sentence structure
suggested_revisions.instruction: Improve prose rhythm: Vary sentence lengths and structures to improve prose rhythm

strengths: Strong character consistency throughout the story
Consistent scene quality throughout the story
Appropriate tone for the story genre
